## TextElement.glyphs property

 Array storing the style \[\[GlyphData\]\] for this `TextElement` to speed up label placement in \[\[TextElementsRenderer\]\]. Valid after `loadingState` is `Initialized`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
glyphs?: GlyphData[];
```
